name: DWNewsBrief
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Get the latest news from Germany's international broadcaster – quick and compact in only three minutes so you will always be up-to-date. 

Now available in video on all compatible devices.

Open the settings function in your Alexa app and choose "Flash Briefing" in order to move "DW News Briefing" to the top of your news list.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
